article.title: Nammo Talley Awarded Assault Weapon Contract with U.S. Marine Corps
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Nammo Talley Incorporated has received a $51.76 million, cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for the system development and demonstration and low-rate initial production of the shoulder-launched multipurpose assault weapon (SMAW II) launchers and fire from enclosure assault rounds and associated data rights. The U.S. Marine Corps Systems Command, Quantico, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
